name: 2Panasonic
description:
It's a nostalgic "game" to help reflect on simpler times. Basically, it's just the bouncing CD drive from way back when. You can pause it with the Spacebar.

Amir Rajan proposed a simple project for the forum: to make a fake bouncing CD logo in a game engine of our choice. It's pretty simple and if you want the full discourse, you can check the Github readme.

https://github.com/Anthogonyst/2Panasonic
